summary: TruthLemma.lean mutual induction has 4 sorries that cannot be eliminated without restructuring. The forward imp case fundamentally requires backward IH. Two alternatives: (A) migrate to SemanticCanonicalModel which has sorry-free semantic_weak_completeness, or (B) restructure with models-based definition. Option A recommended as sorry-free completeness already exists.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of Truth Lemma sorries showing mutual induction is mathematically necessary and documenting existing sorry-free completeness path via semantic_weak_completeness
